#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int k;
        cin>>k;

        if(k%2!=0)
            k=k-1;

        if(k%4==0)
            cout<<(k*k)/16<<endl;
        else
        {
            int x = k/4;
            int y = (k/2)-x;
            cout<<(x*y)<<endl;
        }
    }
}
